product_name: Vittoria Randonneur II Bike Tire - 700 x 28 / 32 / 35
long_description: Stout puncture resistance, long-lasting wear and great value make the reliable Vittoria Randonneur II clincher bike tire an excellent choice for your daily riding. Tire uses a hardy rubber compound to offer lasting use for year-round bike commuting or high-mileage training. Doubling down on puncture protection, the tire features two different layers of puncture-resistant material to deter flats. Tread pattern features shaped channels that push water away from the tire, enhancing grip in wet conditions. Vittoria Randonneur II clincher bike tire has a 30 tpi casing, steel wire bead and recommended tire pressure of 60 - 80 psi.
short_description: Stout puncture resistance, long-lasting wear and great value make the reliable Vittoria Randonneur II clincher bike tire an excellent choice for your daily riding.
